extraction.title: [CLOSED] Add iOS app version to status screen
extraction.description: Issue by jpmens from Wednesday Jan 22, 2014 at 07:47 GMT Originally opened as binarybucks/mqttitude#300I know this sounds stupid, and it may be, but I always have a devil of a time remembering where to find iOS app versions, quite apart from the fact that when I do finally stumble over where they are, it takes ages for the OS to list all apps.Can we take the MQTTitude version and stick it on the status screen? That would make people's lives easier ... (mine at least! :-)
extraction.comments: Comment by ckrey from Wednesday Jan 22, 2014 at 09:05 GMT Comment by jpmens from Wednesday Jan 22, 2014 at 09:35 GMTMaybe a bit too prominent, but fine for the moment, thank you! Comment by ckrey from Wednesday Jan 22, 2014 at 23:16 GMTOk, moved the display to the status screen: Comment by jpmens from Thursday Jan 23, 2014 at 06:13 GMTNice, thanks!
